name: part_009
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY1】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [zkXvWvTX_BE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow showcasing official merchandise for hololive SUPER EXPO 2022 and hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish.
An opening announcement featuring La+ Darknesss and another speaker welcoming the audience to Day 1 of the festival.

subtitles.original: マスクの着用にご協力ください / マナーモードに設定してください / 撮影・録音・録画は禁止
subtitles.english: Please wear a mask / Please set your phone to silent mode / No filming, recording, or photography

subtitles.original: 公演中に声を出すのはご遠慮ください / 自席の前で立ってご鑑賞いただけます / 席の移動はお控えください
subtitles.english: Please refrain from shouting during the show / You may stand in front of your own seat / Please do not move between seats

subtitles.original: ホロライブ6期生のラプラス・ダークネスだ！
subtitles.english: I am La+ Darknesss of hololive's 6th generation!

subtitles.original: 本日は、『hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Weiss Schwarz』DAY1にご来場いただき、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to Day 1 of "hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish supported by Weiss Schwarz" today!
